mapper.sql: SELECT b.booking_id AS bookingId , b.booking_time AS bookingTime , b.booking_adult AS bookingAdult , b.booking_child AS bookingChild , b.visitor_name AS visitorName , b.visitor_phonenum AS visitorPhoneNum , b.booking_pay AS bookingPay , b.booking_startdate AS bookingStartDate , b.booking_enddate AS bookingEndDate , r.room_id AS roomId , u.user_id AS userId , r.lodging_id AS lodgingId FROM booking b, room r, user u WHERE b.room_id = r.room_id AND b.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking (booking_adult, booking_child, visitor_name, visitor_phonenum , booking_pay, booking_startdate, booking_enddate, room_id, user_id) VALUES (#{bookingAdult}, #{bookingChild}, #{visitorName}, #{visitorPhoneNum} , #{bookingPay}, #{bookingStartDate}, #{bookingEndDate}, #{roomId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM booking WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND (booking.booking_startdate < #{bookingEndDate} AND booking.booking_enddate > #{bookingStartDate})
